description: A practical and stylish addition to our Right as Rain collection, the Portwell black raincoat is a true wet-weather essential. To ensure you will stay dry in any downpour, it's waterproof with fully taped seams. Other weather-beating details include an adjustable hood with storm peak and a stom flap to the back which allows droplets to roll away from the back of the coat. An adjustable waist with internal toggles allows you to cinch the coat in for a flattering fit, while a concealed zip and popper fastening creates a clean, sleek finish. It's completed with front pockets with popper fastenings, adjustable cuffs and a half-body lining. title: ghd Original Styler Hair Straightener
description: Single-zone technology™ Round barrel Updated ghd interface Professional length 2.7m cable Universal voltage Automatic sleep mode after 30 minutes 30 second heat up time Making an iconic comeback - the ghd original styler is the good hair day staple that began the ghd journey back in 2001. Updated with improved technology, the cult classic styler is the perfect everyday styling companion.For heat styling that doesn’t compromise the integrity of your hair, the GHD original hair straightener operates at 185°C - the optimum temperature for healthy-looking styles that last. Single-zone™ technology harnesses new generation ceramic heaters to ensure consistent heat delivery across each styling plate. With a versatile rounded barrel and floating plates finished in a smooth gloss coating, create shiny straight styles, beachy waves or tumbling curls with ease.Suitable for all hair types, the new and improved ghd original styler is a good hair day go-to. 94% agree styling is quick and easy*, courtesy of the 30 second heat up time, universal voltage and professional length 360° swivel cord. For added peace of mind, automatic sleep mode switches off the styler after 30 minutes of non-use.Rediscover the OG styler that changed the hair styling game - the ghd original styler, recommended by professionals.*consumer testing, 78 women, April 2021.

title: Stylpro Fabulous Firmer LED Massaging Neck and Face Smoother Device
description: Upgrade your skincare routine with the STYLPRO Fabulous Firmer, bringing the innovative technology of modern spa treatments straight to your home. The Fabulous Firmer is a portable LED Light Therapy device that helps to rejuvenate your skin on the face and neck. Using a combination of heat, massage, and coloured light technology, your new favourite beauty gadget helps to prevent and reduce wrinkles, age spots, acne, and uneven skin. Skip that trip to the spa with your own little LED Light Therapy device what's better than unlimited facials from the comfort of your own couch? How it works: With three settings offering green, red, and blue light therapy, the STYLPRO Fabulous Firmer reduces the appearance of age spots and other skin pigmentations, prevents oil build-up to reduce acne and black heads, and stimulates the production of collagen to increase the firmness and elasticity of your skin. Red light reduces fine lines and stimulates the production of collagen and elastin Blue light reduces redness, inflammation, and acne Green light reduces hyperpigmentation and age spots, brightening the skin How to use: Massage across your skin… From the chin upwards towards your outer cheek From the upper cheek upwards around your temples From the bottom of your neck towards your chin From the bottom of your forehead towards your hairline Benefits: Easy and simple to use 3 different settings - Uses red, blue and green light LED technology Rechargeable with battery charging indicator, no more hunting for batteries with the handy charger Uses heat and vibration massage technology Lightweight, portable and easy to travel with Helps to promote, smoother, firmer, and brighter skin Smoother and silkier skin after use Soothes and repairs skin Helps to reduce black heads and oil build up Includes: 1 x STYLPRO Fabulous Firmer Neck & Face Smoother 1 x Protective Cap 1 x Charging cable 1 x Instruction Leaflet

title: ELEMIS Double The Clean (Worth £49) 23% Saving
description: Cater to your complexion using ELEMIS' Double The Clean set (Worth £49, 23% Saving), a quartet of skin care icons designed to protect your moisture barrier at every step. Upgrade your double cleansing routine with the Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm, a nourishing balm-to-oil staple, which helps melt away make up without stripping skin of moisture. Restore balance with the Nourishing Omega-Rich Cleansing Oil as a barrier-protective alternative. Follow on with the Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Wash, a targeted treatment formula made to refine texture and reveal a brighter, cleaner glow. This gift-worthy set also stars the Pro-Collagen Energising Marine Cleanser, a mineral-rich formula that works to minimise the look of pores and excess oils. title: Stylpro Wavelength LED Face Mask
description: Uncover a radiant and youthful complexion with the STYLPRO Wavelength LED Face Mask. This hands free, wearable device harnesses the power of LED lights, with 4 different modes, to target your skincare needs.The red LED aids the stimulation of collagen production, helping to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, while the blue LED helps target spots and blemishes promoting a clear complexion. Explore the benefits of near-infrared light to help reduce inflammation. The real magic happens with the fourth mode of the red, blue LEDs and near-infrared, working in harmony to address multiple skin concerns simultaneously, assuming no severe skin condition is present.Charging: Insert the USB-C cable (provided) into the port at the top of the remote. Attach to a USB-C friendly power source. The battery icon will show a loading sequence when charging If the controller fails to charge or turn on, a reset is required. Press and hold both buttons for 20 seconds and then immediately begin charging the device, the battery icon should appear. Repeat if unsuccessful How to assemble: Remove all parts of the LED Face Mask from the packaging. This includes the remote, eye comfort pads, black straps, and LED Face Mask Place the eye comfort pads into the eye holes and ensure they are securely attached. See ‘R’ for right and ‘L’ for left on the eye comfort pads Attach the straps into the loops at the side of the LED Face Mask. Ensure the larger end of the strap is facing upward and secure to the crown of your head Plug the wire attached to the LED Face Mask in to the top of the remote. The LED Face Mask will not work if the remote is not plugged into the mask How to use: Once your LED Face Mask is fully assembled, place the LED Face Mask onto your face and securely attach the straps around the crown of your head Long press the On/Off button on the remote. This will turn on to the ‘Anti-ageing’ mode Short press the Mode button to switch to the ‘Target’ mode Short press the Mode button to switch to the ‘Recovery’ mode Short press the Mode button to switch to the ‘Balance’ mode Once you have chosen your preferred Mode, enjoy a 10 minute session To turn off your LED Face Mask before you have completed your 10 minute session, long press the On/Off button

title: ELEMIS Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30 50ml
description: This clinically proven formulation blends a powerful combination of ingredients, including padina pavonica and ginkgo biloba, shown to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles in 14 days. With hydration increased, elasticity and suppleness appear improved and the skin looks firm and toned. A next-generation micronized sunscreen offers a unique encapsulated blend that leaves no white streaks on the face and offers evenly distributed broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection without compromising the texture of the cream.

title: ELEMIS Cleansing Balm 100g
description: Experience the ultimate cleansing experience with ELEMIS award-winning icon – the essential first step in your daily skincare ritual. Journey through three indulgent textures in one. The original rich balm melts into a luxurious oil when gently massaged into the skin, before transforming into a hydrating milk on contact with water. The unique formula effortlessly removes long-wear makeup, daily grime and surface pollutants, and deep cleanses and softens as a facial mask. Infused with a trio of nourishing plant oils, including Elderberry, Optimega™ and Bee Friendly Starflower oil, and ELEMIS superhero algae Padina Pavonica, for soft, hydrated, and glowing skin. ELEMIS's signature blend of 9 essential oils, including Lavender, Chamomile and Eucalyptus invigorate the senses. Unwind and relax whilst you cleanse and treat your skin to a spa experience at home. Mineral oil-free formula. To reduce ELEMIS's global footprint, we will no longer be including cleansing cloths in any new packs produced from October 2023. Use daily as a cleanser. STEP 1: Warm an almond-sized amount of the balm into the skin, massaging over the face, neck and decollete with light circular movements, loosening the balm into an oil. STEP 2: Moisten fingertips and continue to massage so that the oil emulsifies into milk. STEP 3: Either rinse off with water or remove with a cleansing cloth. STEP 4: Leave on for 10-15 minutes, once a week, as a nourishing facial mask.

title: Clarins Total Eye Cream Lift 15ml 15ml
description: The complete eye lifting serum with Clarins' “LIFT” expertise, specifically designed to enhance the eye area. Refillable. PRO-TIGHTENING MATRIX - This comfortable balm provides an instant tightening effect to improve skin elasticity by +53%4. New refillable version.5 1 Comparative clinical study conducted on anti-wrinkle and smoothing effectiveness on 46 women applying a formula containing either organic harungana extract or retinol with the same % of ingredient as the finished product, over 56 days. 2 Two Clarins patents registered in France on the effectiveness of harungana extract. 3 In vitro test on harungana extract. 4 Instrumental test on silicone support. 5 The refill cannot be used on its own. title: Australian Gold Moisture Lock Hydrating Tan Extender 473ml
description: Enriched with aloe, this ultra-hydrating formula contains natural oils, antioxidants, and vitamins to nourish skin. A bestseller to bring with you on holiday as a hydrating after-sun, and also to use daily for longer-lasting tan results. What’s inside? Hydrating oils: sunflower seed oil and olive fruit oil retain moisture in the skin, making it a perfect after-sun product to rejuvenate and nourish skin. Aloevera: natural soothing properties for deeply conditioned skin and a gentle cooling feel. Australian native tea tree oil: used to help provide powerful antioxidant properties to gently cleanse for smooth skin and also provides a soothing, cooling feel. Specially formulated - PABA-free, dye-free, alcohol-free, and gluten-free. Fragrance: classic cocoa dreams. Size - 237ml, but also available in a 473ml bottle. By applying a tan extender, your skin will be kept soft, smooth, and healthy after a day at the beach. This will also encourage a longer-lasting, healthy, golden glow, making it perfect for holding onto that post-holiday sunkiss. Top tip: Moisture Lock is the perfect holiday product to pair up with your sun cream! Use it every day after you shower to lock in your holiday tan. When is best to apply your Australian Gold Moisture Lock Tan Extender? After showering or bathing to restore hydration - hot water can strip skin of its natural oils. After tanning. Daily!

title: Australian Gold SPF 15 Instant Bronzer Spray Gel Suncream 237ml
description: Australian Gold’s Bronze SPF 15 Spray Gel with Bronzer provides top-quality, certified Broad Spectrum sun protection along with a skincare boost for anti-ageing and softened skin. The immediate bronzer ensures an instant golden glow, helping to combat flushed tones for a beautifully even tan. What’s inside?Caramel: Delivers an instant glow for a gorgeous sun-kissed feel and combats flushed tones in the skin for a golden tan. This bronzer washes away easily with water without staining the skin Kakadu Plum: The fruit with the highest level of vitamin C, which boosts the sun cream’s effectiveness while protecting from free radicals for an anti-ageing benefit Aloe Vera: Deeply hydrates and nourishes the skin, while providing natural skin-soothing properties Moisturisers: Sunflower Seed Oil and Olive Fruit Oil provide deep hydration and nourishment for soft, moisturised skin Australian Tea Tree Oil: A natural antibacterial that works to prevent after-tan odours, leaving you feeling and smelling fresh after a day in the sun Free from parabens, PABA, dyes, alcohol, and gluten. Classic CocoaDreams fragrance. In a 237ml bottle. The gel consistency absorbs quickly into the skin without a greasy after-feel. Water-resistant for up to 80 minutes, and the easy-to-use pump spray makes this perfect for a hassle-free sunscreen experience. Top Tip: For safe tanning, start with a medium to high protection sun cream before transitioning to lower protection as your tan develops. How to apply:Apply 20 minutes before sun exposure Can be layered with tanning lotion, which should be applied immediately before sun exposure Reapply every 2 hours as a minimum, or more frequently if swimming, sweating, or towel drying

title: Coco & Eve Sunny Honey Tan Boosting Anti-Aging SPF30 Body Oil 150ml
description: Get ready to glow! Activate your natural tan this summer with our Bali-inspired body oil and sunscreen in one. Perfect your tan and protect your skin!Our anti-aging SPF 30 sunscreen oil combined with a tan activating complex provides a radiant, youthful tan all summer long. Not only will it boost your natural tanning effect, but it also protects your skin with its SPF30 broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection. Plus, it's water-resistant, ensuring lasting protection while you enjoy the sun.Formulated with a tan-boosting biomimetic peptide and a tan activator complex, this oil-based sunscreen accelerates tanning for a natural, radiant glow (without any self-tanning DHA). It's lightweight and fast-absorbing for a smooth, non-greasy finish.This sunscreen is also an anti-aging superstar, thanks to its rich antioxidant content, nourishing oil base, and photoaging protection. And to top it off, it's scented with Coco & Eve’s iconic tropical mango & guava fragrance for those beachy vibes. Leave behind dull, damaged skin and turn on your golden, youthful glow with our tan-activating body oil sunscreen.

title: Dermalogica Skin Perfect Primer SPF 30 30ml
description: Smooth away fine lines, brighten and prime for flawless skin, and prep for makeup application. Velvety silicones combine with soy protein to even out skin texture, creating an instantly smooth surface. Natural minerals provide a neutral tint to balance skin tone and enhance luminosity and radiance. A potent peptide helps improve skin firmness, as sunscreens shield against sun damage. White tea polyphenols inhibit collagen damage by destructive MMPs and free radicals. Wear alone over your moisturiser for visible smoothness and luminosity, or after moisturiser application and before foundation to help fill fine lines for a lasting makeup finish. A makeup primer, sunscreen, and treatment for skin aging in one. Stimulates collagen production to increase skin firmness. Has a silky feel and provides a smooth surface for a soft focus effect. Formula facts: Gluten-free, no artificial fragrances or colours, cruelty-free.

title: Australian Gold SPF 30 Ultimate Hydration Spray Gel Suncream 237ml
description: Australian Gold's SPF 30 Clear Spray Gel offers top-quality sun protection alongside great skincare. The antioxidant-rich formula containing Aloe Vera, Vitamin E, Australian Tea Tree Oil and Sunflower Seed Extracts nourishes your skin whilst you’re out in the sun, keeping it moisturised and healthy. The gel consistency ensures that this sun protection absorbs into the skin quickly and without any greasy after-feel. Very water resistant with an easy to use, lockable, pump action spray, this is perfect for those looking for an easy-to-apply sunscreen.

title: Dermalogica Dynamic Skin Recovery Moisturiser 50ml
description: Help minimise skin aging triggers with this medium-weight, emollient daily moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF50. Anti-oxidant white tea, rich in polyphenols, inhibits lipid peroxide formation and helps neutralise free radicals, advanced glycation end products, and matrix metalloproteinases MMPs. Patented oleosome encapsulation technology boosts sunscreen effectiveness for critical protection against UV rays, while a unique polypeptide helps encourage collagen-producing activities. Blends smoothly over skin to create a perfected finish. Provides long-lasting hydration and critical protection against UV light. Helps control the triggers that lead to skin aging. Blends smoothly into skin for a perfected finish. Formula facts: Gluten-free, no artificial fragrances or colours, cruelty-free.

title: BY TERRY Tea to Tan Face & Body Bronzing Mist Travel Size
description: GET THE PERFECT TAN! Hydrating and bronzing skincare mist. Natural matte finish. 24h of hydration. Long-lasting. Suitable for all skin types. Innovation: This transfer-proof formula tints the skin without tanning agents and is easy to remove with water! An iconic BY TERRY product, the Tea to Tan Face & Body spray is a unique fusion of skincare and bronzing perfection to hydrate and protect the skin with a natural sun-kissed glow. Like a tea infusion, its water-based formula gives the skin a long-lasting tint, without coverage. The lightweight, fresh texture quickly dries on skin for easy, even application without coverage nor transfer. Enhancing the sensory journey, a captivating fragrance accompanies each use, beckoning you on a delightful voyage. How to use: For the body: spritz directly onto skin and using a large brush, fingertips or a sponge, blend for a smooth and seamless application. Build the formula in layers until you get the desired depth of tan and let it dry for at least a minute For the face: spritz directly onto a small foundation brush and lightly blend across the face or add a few drops into your favourite moisturiser

title: Australian Gold SPF 30 Instant Bronzer Lotion Suncream 237ml
description: Australian Gold SPF 30 Lotion with Bronzer. Australian Gold’s antioxidant-rich SPF 30 Lotion with bronzers offers top-quality, certified broad-spectrum sun protection alongside great skincare for an anti-aging boost and softened skin. What’s inside? Kona coffee and caramel: this sunscreen is perfect for those looking for a hint of color thanks to its immediate, natural bronzers, providing an instant splash of color that combats flushed tones in the skin and washes away easily with water. Kakadu plum: this fruit has the highest level of vitamin C found in any fruit, which works to boost the efficacy of the sun cream while protecting from free radicals for an anti-aging twist. Aloe vera: deeply hydrates and nourishes while also providing natural skin-soothing properties. Moisturizers: cocoa butter, sunflower seed oil, and olive fruit oil to deeply hydrate and nourish your skin. Green tea and vitamin E: ideal for soothing and combating free radicals for powerful anti-aging properties. Australian tea tree oil: a natural antibacterial that works to prevent after-tan odors from occurring, leaving you feeling and smelling fresh after a day in the sun. Paraben, PABA, dye, alcohol, and gluten free. Classic Cocoa Dreams fragrance. 237ml bottle. The consistency is thicker than our spray gels but is still lightweight, ensuring that this sun protection absorbs into the skin quickly and without any greasy after-feel. Water-resistant for up to 80 minutes, and with an easy-to-use pump action spray, this is perfect for those looking for an easy-to-apply sunscreen. Top tip: to tan safely, we recommend starting off your holiday with a medium to high protection sun cream before moving onto a low protection sun cream. How to apply your Australian Gold SPF 30 Lotion with Bronzers: apply your sun cream 20 minutes before sun exposure. Can be layered with tanning lotion, which is applied immediately before sun exposure. Reapply your sun cream (and tanning lotion) every two hours as a minimum. This frequency should be increased if swimming, sweating, or towel drying.

title: Tog 24 Green Womens Alva Waterproof Coats
description: When it comes to waterproof jackets, it doesn’t get much more stylish than the Alva. Its fully taped seams and waterproof coating ensure you keep the rain out and the warmth in, which is ideal for when the rain pours and the winds blow. Also, to ensure you’re ready for whatever the weather throws at you, the removable and adjustable hood comes complete with drawcords at the opening, while the handy two-way zip provides extra mobility. What’s more, the toggle adjusters on the waist offer that ''cinched-in'' feel, which is both figure-flattering and great for keeping your torso toasty. With style and substance in abundance, the Alva is your trusty companion for keeping you dry and stylish in the unpredictable British weather.
